timeline.message: JS: Added an inProgress prop that will show a spinning icon when a user saves a config in TableDisplay
JS: When creating Users, we now wait for the post to complete before closing the Modal giving the user better feedback about what's happening.
JS: Added some state changes that helps keep the TableDisplay modal open when an item is still being processed.

timeline.bodyText: What is the purpose of the incrementalId?
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: The permissions are stored in a table in state. Because of this, there is no id associated with any of the rows. In order to edit a row and know which one needs to be modified, we need an ID. This incrementalId is used to track rows in state to know what rows are being modified.
replies.author: bamandel
